title: Client constantly trying to reconnect to game?
body: I been here for quite some time and i still cant get to play, i dont want to exit out the game when i know dang well its gonna give me a leavebuster, this isn't the first time this happen. PLEASE dont give me a leavebuster when i am still sitting here waiting to reconnect knowing the game probably already over. I was playing {{champion:21}} and {{champion:82}}  when this happen.

replies.body:
Since you keep getting kicked out of matches because your client needs to reconnect, let's address that connection issue first. Your own internet is probably fine, but your network might be having a hard time keeping a stable connection to the game server you're playing on for one reason or another. 

Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for ways we can troubleshoot.
